text: Gluta travancorica (Malayalam: ശെന്തുരുണി) is a species of plant in the family Anacardiaceae. It is endemic to India. This species is commonly found in the eastern area of Southern Kerala, especially Kollam District. A wildlife sanctuary in Kollam district is named after this tree, which is locally called 'shenduruni'. ==References== Category:Flora of Kerala travancorica Category:Near threatened plants Category:Kollam district Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Gluta travancorica
